metadata.title: CVE-2015-4634 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
SQL injection vulnerability in graphs.php in Cacti before 0.8.8e allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the local_graph_idparameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4634` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8e+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.8e+ds1-1').
